message-template.name: Pronation Missing
message-template.conditions: conditions: - condition: operation: is_not_set attributes: attribute: user.pronation

message.text-message: Thanks. You're nearly there. Time for a sprint finish...
You may have heard of pronation. It's the way your foot rolls each time it lands.
You probably also know that you'll be more comfortable if your shoes are suited to your pronation.

button-message.text: Do you know your pronation type?
